name: tea
effect: Used to bribe the saffron city guards for entry to the city.

flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A thirst-quenching
tea prepared by an
old lady.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
An aromatic tea prepared by an old
lady. It will slake even the worst
thirst.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
Aromatic tea that has a slightly bitter taste.
It soothes a dry throat.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
Aromatic tea that has a slightly bitter taste.
It soothes a dry throat.
